mapper.select: select del_code, comp_code, sw_code, sw_code, supply_price, supply_amount, order_date, del_isExist from delivery
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery(del_code, comp_code, sw_code, supply_price, supply_amount, order_date, del_isExist) VALUES (#{delCode}, #{compCode}, #{swCode}, #{supplyPrice}, #{supplyAmount}, #{orderDate}, #{delIsExist})
mapper.update: UPDATE delivery SET del_isExist=#{delIsExist} WHERE del_code=#{delCode}
